name: Emirates Society for Rheumatology Annual Meeting 2022
content: The Emirates Society for Rheumatology (ESR) is a member of Emirates Medical Association, and works tirelessly to improve the standard and quality of Rheumatology care in the UAE. ESR achieves its goals by collaboration with all healthcare providers and has established a network of Rheumatologists throughout the UAE. ESR promotes a high educational standard by holding regular high quality educational events independently, and also in collaboration with the major international Rheumatology societies. ESR works relentlessly to collaborate with governmental departments to facilitate the implementation of best practices in Rheumatology guidelines and recommendations. ESR advocates the training and development of allied healthcare professionals in Rheumatology.
